requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (x64 x86)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790k (AMD Ryzen 7 1700)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

results.name: SteamCity Chronicles - Rise Of The Rose

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video Card with at least 4 GB RAM

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP+
  • Processor: 1 GHz Intel or AMD Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL or DirectX Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game runs at 720p and is not meant for displays with a resolution below 1280x720
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Additional Notes: The game runs at 720p and is not meant for displays with a resolution below 1280x720

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7/8.1/10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: AMD / Intel dual-core (with hyper-threading) CPU, running at 3 GHz (AMD FX 4100 series or Intel Core i3-2000 series or newer architectures are recommended)
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA dedicated graphic card, with at least 2048MB of dedicated VRAM and Shader Model 5.1 support. AMD R7 265 and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or newer architectures are recommended.
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse and internet connection for Steam
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: AMD / Intel quad-core processor running at 3.5 GHz (AMD Athlon X4 950 series or Intel Core i5 3000 series or newer architectures are recommended)
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA dedicated graphic card, with at least 2048 / 4096MB of dedicated VRAM (or more) and Shader Model 5.1 support. ATI/AMD Radeon HD 7870 and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or newer architectures are recommended.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse and internet connection for Steam.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
